mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.data.field

Class ArrayWriter<RowType,FieldType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.data.field.ArrayWriter<RowType,FieldType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldVisibilityHandler<RowType,FieldType[]>, FieldWriter<RowType,FieldType[]>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayWriter.FixedSizeObjectArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.VariableSizeObjectArrayWriter

    public class ArrayWriter<RowType,FieldType>
extends Object
implements FieldWriter<RowType,FieldType[]>
    This class contains all of the object array writer field types supported
